page.title: 17Our Local Newspaper....Part1
page.content: Our local,weekly newspaper is the Bootle Times.It tells us about the things that are happening in our area. Some of the news is a pleasure to read such as how a group of school children raised Â£165 from a concert to help the Leukaemia Research Fund and how firemen rescued an 88 year old disabled man who was trapped in a house fire. Unfortunately,most news is bad news,like that about the 80 year old woman who was killed after being hit over the head with an iron bar,by a youth who had broken into her home. Another news item was about drug pushers and there was an item about a 38 year old man who was charged with possession of firearms and ammunition. This week there was a report about a burst water main which wrecked a new road surface,flooding the road and bringing traffic to a standstill.
